caseStudies.title: Landmark Property Dispute Resolution
caseStudies.summary: Successfully resolved a complex multi-party property dispute involving ancestral land worth ₹50 Crores in Chennai.
caseStudies.challenge: Our client faced competing claims from multiple parties over a prime commercial property. The case involved disputed will documents, alleged fraud, and years of illegal possession by third parties.
caseStudies.approach: We conducted thorough title investigation, gathered historical records from Sub-Registrar offices, and presented irrefutable documentary evidence. Our team also initiated parallel proceedings to address fraudulent transactions.
caseStudies.result: The High Court ruled in favor of our client, establishing clear title and ordering eviction of illegal occupants. The judgment has become a reference for similar property disputes in Tamil Nadu.
caseStudies.testimonial: The dedication shown by SKS Law Associates was extraordinary. They left no stone unturned.

caseStudies.title: ₹200 Crore Corporate Merger
caseStudies.summary: Advised and executed a complex merger between two manufacturing giants, navigating regulatory approvals and stakeholder interests.
caseStudies.challenge: The merger involved significant regulatory hurdles, employee union concerns, and complex tax implications. Both companies had operations across multiple states with varying compliance requirements.
caseStudies.approach: Our team structured the deal to optimize tax efficiency while ensuring regulatory compliance. We negotiated with employee unions and obtained all necessary approvals from CCI and other authorities.
caseStudies.result: The merger was completed smoothly, creating synergies worth ₹30 Crores annually. All employees were retained, and the combined entity achieved significant market position.
caseStudies.testimonial: Their corporate expertise made a complex transaction feel seamless. Exceptional work!

caseStudies.title: High-Profile Criminal Acquittal
caseStudies.summary: Secured complete acquittal for a senior business executive falsely accused in a fraud case involving allegations of ₹15 Crores.
caseStudies.challenge: Our client was arrested based on circumstantial evidence and false testimony. The case received significant media attention, affecting both personal reputation and business operations.
caseStudies.approach: We methodically dismantled the prosecution's case by exposing inconsistencies in witness statements and presenting forensic evidence of our client's innocence. We also filed defamation suits against false accusers.
caseStudies.result: The court acquitted our client of all charges, noting the prosecution's failure to prove guilt beyond reasonable doubt. Our client's reputation was restored, and business operations resumed normally.
caseStudies.testimonial: They believed in my innocence when no one else did. My family owes them everything.

caseStudies.title: Cyber Crime Investigation & Recovery
caseStudies.summary: Traced and recovered ₹85 Lakhs stolen through sophisticated phishing attacks, leading to conviction of the perpetrators.
caseStudies.challenge: A well-organized cybercrime ring had infiltrated our client's payment systems, siphoning funds through multiple layers of shell accounts. Traditional investigation methods had failed.
caseStudies.approach: We coordinated with cyber cells, engaged digital forensic experts, and traced the money trail across multiple banks. Our legal team secured freezing orders and initiated prosecution under the IT Act.
caseStudies.result: All stolen funds were recovered, and three perpetrators were convicted. The case set a precedent for cybercrime prosecution in Tamil Nadu.
caseStudies.testimonial: Their tech-savvy approach to legal issues is what every modern business needs.

caseStudies.title: Consumer Class Action Victory
caseStudies.summary: Led a class action representing 400+ home buyers against a defaulting real estate developer, securing ₹120 Crores in compensation.
caseStudies.challenge: The developer had collected advances for a housing project but failed to deliver possession for over 5 years. Individual buyers lacked resources to fight the builder's legal team.
caseStudies.approach: We organized affected buyers, filed a consolidated case before RERA and Consumer Forum, and obtained interim orders preventing asset disposal. We also initiated criminal proceedings against the developer.
caseStudies.result: The National Consumer Disputes Redressal Commission ordered full refund with 12% interest to all buyers. The developer's directors were also held personally liable.
caseStudies.testimonial: They gave us hope when we had lost everything. This was justice served.

caseStudies.title: Major GST Dispute Resolution
caseStudies.summary: Successfully challenged and quashed a ₹4.5 Crore GST demand notice based on erroneous classification by tax authorities.
caseStudies.challenge: The GST department had incorrectly classified our client's products under a higher tax bracket and issued a retrospective demand. This threatened the viability of the business.
caseStudies.approach: Our team conducted detailed analysis of HSN codes, prepared comprehensive technical submissions, and obtained favorable rulings from the Advance Ruling Authority. We simultaneously appealed the demand order.
caseStudies.result: The Appellate Authority quashed the entire demand, confirming the correct classification. The judgment provided clarity for the entire textile industry on similar products.
caseStudies.testimonial: Their tax expertise saved our business. We recommend them without hesitation.
